rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0001
rows.name:
How did his Devices make it all the
way to the palace?!

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0002
rows.name:
What's the plan? You wanna use
my power?

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0003
rows.name:
No, there'd be too many casualties.
It won't be easy, but we'll need to
take them out one by one.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0004
rows.name:
Shouldn't we be trying to escort the
civilians to safety?

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0005
rows.name:
The Iiran army is already working
on the evacuation. They know the
city's layout far better than us.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0006
rows.name: Ah, right. Best leave it to them, then.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0008
rows.name:
They haven't broken through the rear
yet, so we can start by clearing out the
Gargoyles in the residential ward.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0009
rows.name:
After that, we can head over to the
shopping ward on the left-hand side...

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0010
rows.name:
and then work our way straight
towards the front entrance.

rows.label: fev11_550_175_msg0012
rows.name:
Best of luck, everyone. Now let's
get these ugly mugs off our damn
doorstep!
